alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 30 at 8:52PM CDT until May 30 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT/3 AM MDT/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Kansas and west central Kansas, including the following counties, in northwest Kansas, Sherman and Thomas. In west central Kansas, Logan. * WHEN...Until 400 AM CDT Wednesday /300 AM MDT Wednesday/. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 850 PM CDT /750 PM MDT/, the public reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is already occurring on some secondary roadways. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen, with up to an additional inch overnight is possible. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Six Mile Gulch, S Branch Hackberry Creek, Middle Branch Hackberry Creek, Plum Creek, South Branch Hackberry Creek, N Branch Hackberry Creek, Sand Creek, North Fork Smoky Hill River, Smoky Hill River, South Fork Saline River, North Branch Hackberry Creek, North Fork Saline River and West Spring Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Winona and Monument, as well as areas along Highway 40. All secondary roadways will be affected, especially in Logan county in the warned area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
